name: Prototype 4 (uran10)
description:
Prototype and Challenge 4 from the unity jr Developer course.

Ball Sumo control the ball with the up and down arrow keys and use the left and right arrow keys to move the camera and influence where the ball goes. Knock off the opposing balls to win. Use power ups to secure your victory

Yellow powerup - Push power

Red Power up - Jump and shockwave slam

Blue Power up - Homing missiles.

Controls :

Up and down arrow keys to move

Left and right to rotate camera

Spacebar when having the shock wave power up

F - to fire when using the Missile power up.

Soccer, use the up and down arrow keys to move the ball forward and back and the left and right arrow keys to move the camera to influence where the ball goes. Collect a push power up to push the enemy balls back into their own goals.

Left and right to rotate the camera

up and down to move the ball.
